com.didactapp.didact.contracts

Interface BasePresenter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ChapterContract.Presenter, LibraryContract.Presenter, LoginContract.Presenter, RegisterContract.Presenter, SectionContract.Presenter, SectionDetailContract.Presenter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChapterPresenter, LibraryPresenter, SectionDetailPresenter, SectionPresenter 

    public interface BasePresenter<T>
    base presenter interface - template for implementing presentation and business logic handlers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dropView()
      Drops the reference to the view when destroyed
      void networkConnected()
      called when network is connected
      void networkDisconnected()
      handle no network connection
      void takeView(T view)
      Binds presenter with a view when resumed.
      void update()
      view update requested

    • Method Detail

      • takeView

        void takeView(T view)
        Binds presenter with a view when resumed. The Presenter will perform initialization here.

        Drops the reference to the view when destroyed
